LUXURY SPA OPENS IN NEW YORK
The high-end beauty brand La Mer is opening its first-ever worldwide spa Wednesday at the Baccarat Hotel and Residences New York in Midtown Manhattan. Called Spa de La Mer , the 1,900-square-foot space is on the hotel’s lower level, and, like the rest of the property, was designed by the Paris-based Gilles & Boissier who wanted it to be reminiscent of a European seaside retreat. The ceilings are vaulted, and the soothing colors throughout include warm champagne and bronze tones. Also, each of the four treatment rooms have a wall with a sea kelp mural that was hand-painted by the New York artists Lynda White and Jeff Wood.
